description:
★ ★ ★ ★ ★  WAGmob: Over 350,000 paying customers from 175+ countries. ★ ★ ★ ★ ★  

WAGmob brings you a Simple 'n Easy, on-the-go learning app to help you get started on Romanian language. A beginner's guide that teaches you the basics in a nice and organized manner.  Fast, easy and fun way to learn Romanian.

Features include phrasebook, tutorials. 

App is continuously updated based on your feedback. Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.

Designed for English Speakers. Tap a phrase and it will be spoken for you in Romanian, anytime, anywhere!

Meeting friends and co-workers from Romania could be much more fun with this app. Focus is on everyday phrases and words.

App tools include search, bookmark and facebook integration.




Includes following tutorials:

Why learn Romanian,
Tips for Effective Language Learning.


Includes following PhraseBooks:

Greetings and General Words,
Phrases for Courtesy,
Food, Drink and Going Out,
Places, People, and Family,
Travelling Around,
General Questions,
Police Emergency,
Medical and Disaster Emergency,
Shopping,
Dating,
Sports and the Outdoors,




What is unique about WAGmob apps?

1) A touch friendly, quick reference app, which is always in your pocket and always works (no data connection required).

2) A companion app for on-the-go, bite-sized learning.

3) Offers value for money (a lifetime of free updates).

4) Over 350,000 paying customers from 175+ countries.



Our Vision: Provide on-the-go references that enable our customers to refer, learn and remember; easy to learn, more engaging and truly complete.

Our Mission: A WAGmob app in every pocket.


Please write to us at team@wagmob.com. We would love to improve this app.
